!Tetrarch Thifiell: A change of profession occurs when someone with the required abilities and experience is promoted to a more advanced profession. Unfortunately, you cannot change your profession here. However, I can give you some information. Dark Fighters like yourself can change profession to become a *Palus Knight* or an *Assassin*. Which profession do you want to learn about? [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30358/03.htm|Palus Knight] [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30358/04.htm|Assassin]Â
